sentences: Bogdan Raczynski (born 1977) is a Polish-American electronic musician.
All of Raczynski's non-netlabel albums through 2010 were released on Rephlex Records.
Raczynski was born in Poland, but later moved to the United States with his family.
He attended art school in Japan, but later dropped out and eventually became homeless, living on the streets of Tokyo or in friends' homes.
He then took up residence in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
